name: Canopy
slogan: A new way to make renting easier, faster & more affordable
description:
Canopy is reinventing renting through its unique RentPassport. By downloading the mobile or web app for free and building their Rent Passport. Rather than having to find a large cash lump sum (on average £2,700 per property in London), renters can choose to purchase DepositFree cover provided by Hiscox. There’s currently £4.2billion of deposits held in protection schemes, which we’re certain can be put to better use. 

Significantly, we’re about to launch a revolutionary product which allows renters to boost their credit score, all by simply paying their rent on time to their landlord as they normally would.

jobs.title: Account Manager
jobs.description:
What you will do

This role isn’t just checking in on our partners, its owning & developing a process to make sure Canopy delivers on everything we promise. That means liasing with the product team on improvements for our app, letting agents on the type & amounts of marketing support they need & running events & meetups so we know our community & they know and trust us.

Help acquire, onboard and service new partners (estate agents & build-to-rent operators) 
Input feedback to tech teams to ensure Canopy is the industry leading product.
Assist with training of new property partners to make them enthusiastic & knowledgeable about the benefits we bring.
Handle key accounts to ensure maximum take-up of Canopy products by partner’s landlords & renters by providing constant support & consultation. 
Step up to ensure targets are met and processes are improved

What do we expect?

Excellent spoken and written English
Good knowledge of the residential lettings industry (we provide training so we only need a positive mindset and willingness to learn).
Ability to identify & close new partnership opportunities.
You’ll go the extra mile to ensure customers are happy & partnerships are as beneficial as possible with regular account management calls, meetings & events.
Ability to spot and act on a commercial opportunity, whether with an existing or prospective partner.
Proactive mindset to see opportunities within the market - both with property companies, renters & other companies who can support our community.

What can we offer?

Strong salary & options.
Full training on our product, industry & team culture (which is awesome).
The ability to radically change several industries. 
Employee pension scheme. 
Health & Dental Insurance.
Free beer and coffee.
Huge potential for professional growth & role progression.

jobs.title: Customer Operations Executive
jobs.description:
At Canopy we’re all about making renting more rewarding.

Our core product, the Rent Passport, allows our users to build a digital profile to record their merit as a renter, whilst giving agents & landlords the tools to trust them.

Once our users build their Rent Passport, they’ll then have the option to use our Deposit Free product, removing the need to tie up 6 weeks of rent in a cash deposit. There’s currently £4billion + of hard earned cash tied up in these deposits, which we’re certain can be put to better use.

We’ve so far been backed by Direct Line Group, Experian & Round Hill Capital, are working with some of the biggest names in property. Canopy is in the middle of Series A funding and need top talent to help us grow on our journey. 

We’re ideally looking for a graduate to start in January 2019! 

The Customer Service Team’s responsibilities include:
•	Providing exceptional customer service via phone, email, live chat and social media.
•	Maintaining high service standards and continually improving the service to our customers
•	Conveying our customers’ feedback and feature requests to the product & marketing team
•	Responding to customer queries and escalating any issues as necessary
•	Document, Submit and Track platform bugs and issues by using tools like Zendesk and Jira
•	Actively seeking to improve processes and workflows
•	Working well within a dynamic team environment
•	Investigating and resolving issues whilst proactively seeking solutions

As an early member of our customer team, you’ll have a huge opportunity to progress, as well as make your own stamp on the future of Canopy & how we interact with the world. Be prepared to have a hand in different parts of the business! 

Requirements
•	Strong customer focus
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
•	Some direct customer service experience required (call centres, sales, retail)
•	Ability to handle changing workload and deal with multiple priorities
•	Aptitude to work with a team in a changing environment and responsibilities
•	Fluent in English

Perks
•	Free snacks, drinks & beer when in the office
•	Flexible working situation
•	Chance to join a company with a big future, right at the start.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company.
